insert into KAKAO_PAY(KPAY_NUM, THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID, KPAY_AMOUNT, KPAY_OCCUPIED_SEAT, KPAY_SEAT_CNT, MEMBER_ID) values(#{KPAY_NUM}, #{scheduleId}, #{totalPrice}, #{KPAY_OCCUPIED_SEAT}, #{seatCnt}, #{MEMBER_ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE KAKAO_PAY SET pg_token = #{pg_token} WHERE pg_token IS NULL AND KPAY_NUM = (SELECT MAX(KPAY_NUM) FROM KAKAO_PAY WHERE pg_token IS NULL) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM KAKAO_PAY WHERE pg_token = #{pg_token})
mapper.select: select * from KAKAO_PAY where pg_token IS NOT NULL
